metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15121 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In radare2 before version 4.5.0, malformed PDB file names in the PDB server path cause shell injection. To trigger the problem it's required to open the executable in radare2 and run idpd to trigger the download. The shell code will execute, and will create a file called pwned in the current directory.

criterions.comment: radare2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
